thread.title: Imperial Landscaping LLC of Winston Salem, is Currently Offering their Services for Commercial Lawn Maintenance an a Contractual Basis
thread.title_full: Imperial Landscaping LLC of Winston Salem, is Currently Offering their Services for Commercial Lawn Maintenance an a Contractual Basis - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Imperial Landscaping LLC of Winston Salem, is Currently Offering their Services for Commercial Lawn Maintenance an a Contractual Basis
text:
Imperial Landscaping LLC, a Winston Salem NC based lawn maintenance company is currently offering their many years of experience and expertise in beautifying and maintaining HOA's, financial institutions, and franchises.
 WINSTON-SALEM, NC, October 22, Imperial Landscaping LLC is seeking dissatisfied community management developments and corporate centers that are frustrated over changing from one lawn care company to another year after year because of poor service, broken contractual promises, and lack of attention to detail by landscaping and lawn maintenance companies that fail to fulfill the services that they pledged to provide.
"With Imperial Landscaping you get professional lawn maintenance and attention to detail that is lacking in other lawn care companies while staying within the budget," said President James Tolentino. Year after year Imperial Landscaping has remained faithful to the operating principles that made it the 5 star award winning company that it is today.
Serving Winston Salem, Greensboro, High Point, Kernersville, Clemmons, Lewisville, Advance, Lexington, Midway and surrounding areas since 2008.
